Quick search

Patch¶

Patch reference¶

class Patch¶

Used to abstractly represent a change to the source code of an artefact. All subclasses of Patch implement their own to_diff method, responsible for transforming their own internal representation to a diff.

to_diff() → str¶

Returns the contents of this patch as a diff.
